comment.author: 10771167@N00
comment._content: American poet Berton Braley and writer Marion Rubincam were married in 1915, reportedly on Henry Ford's Peace Ship.  The couple separated in 1920.

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: His wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Berton_Braley The marriage ceremony was performed by Rev. Jenkin Lloyd Jones (photo nearby) according to The Bolivar Breeze, Dec. 9, 1915. The Milwaukee Journal, Dec. 5, 1915 has another version of the story. About their divorce: The Pittsburgh Press, Jan. 26, 1920

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: B-59: Thanks for the information about Braley and Rubincam.  We will include some of your information next time we update.
